snippet: Justices will hear oral arguments Monday in a challenge brought by 26 states to President Obama’s executive action to expand protections for immigrants.
abstract: Illegal immigrants Jerry Pinto and wife Elvira await Supreme Court decision that will determine their ability to remain in country with their three children, one of whom is an American citizen; twenty-six states led by Texas will present oral arguments that challenge Pres Obama's Deferred Action for Parents of Americans and Lawful Permanent Residents.
lead_paragraph: Justices will hear oral arguments Monday in a challenge brought by 26 states to President Obama’s executive action to expand protections for immigrants.

headline.main: Family of Immigrants, Only One a Citizen, Anxiously Awaits Supreme Court Ruling
headline.print_headline: A Family Anxiously Awaiting a Supreme Court Outcome
